activities:
Maxymiser platform processes any behavioral data related to visitors to our customers’ websites in an anonymous format. 

Maxymiser does not hold any Personally Identifiable Information (PII) related to the websites of its customers and insists that its customers do not communicate any PII to Maxymiser platform.

Maxymiser will not review, share, distribute, print, sell or reference any data of visitors to its customer’s websites except as explicitly requested by the customer.

Maxymiser.com will collect personal data as part of client's request for information such as name, address, phone number & company name. Maxymiser uses this information as necessary to fulfill customer's request.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Anonymized client's visitors data as submitted to Maxymiser platform and client data submitted on Maxymiser corporate website.
recoursemech: Maxymiser is a member of BBB EU Safe Harbor Program.
